#{{{ Length units
km = 1e3
m = 1.0
cm = 0.01
mm = 1e-3
um = 1e-6
nm = 1e-9
#}}}

#{{{ Conversion Functions


[docs]def rad2deg(rad):
    return rad * 180.0 / pi



[docs]def deg2rad(deg):
    return deg * pi /180.0
